children.name: text
children.label: Card text
children.default: Ensure you always have fresh data in the channels you work with, with hourly runs for correct prices and stock.

children.name: uniq_btn
children.label: Unique Button Style
children.help_text: Gives the button a unique style - separate from the shared style set in the settings tab. USE THIS SPARINGLY - IF AT ALL

children.name: use_uniq_btn
children.label: Use Unique Button
children.help_text: Allows you to set a unique button style for the individual card - use sparingly

Our crawl tool makes it easy to collect product data from any shopping platform or website.

default.heading: Crawl Websites
default.text:
Looking to create a product feed from scratch.
Our crawl tool makes it easy to collect product data from any shopping platform or website.

children.name: text
children.label: Card text
children.default:
Scrape specific data from your website and merge it to your product feed.
Do you have incomplete product information? No worries! Retrieve the missing attributes by extracting the data from your website and integrating it into your main feed.

default.heading: Scrape From Websites
default.text:
Scrape specific data from your website and merge it to your product feed.
Do you have incomplete product information? No worries! Retrieve the missing attributes by extracting the data from your website and integrating it into your main feed.

children.name: text
children.label: Card text
children.default: Get personalized support from our knowledgeable CSMs and take your business to new apexes with our monthly consultancy hours at half the cost. Sign up now and let us help you achieve your goals!

default.heading: Access to feed experts
default.text: Get personalized support from our knowledgeable CSMs and take your business to new apexes with our monthly consultancy hours at half the cost. Sign up now and let us help you achieve your goals!

card_1.heading: Near real-time data
card_1.text: Ensure you always have fresh data in the channels you work with, with hourly runs for correct prices and stock.

card_2.heading: Product Search Ads
card_2.text: Take up more SERP space with dynamic, product based Google Search Ads.

card_3.heading: Enrich Social Images
card_3.text: Increase revenue from social channels by creating personalised content for all your products.

card_4.heading: Incremental Updates
card_4.text: Update prices and stock before with our game-changing solution for ERP-based companies. Eliminate slow loading times and streamline inventory management, saving you time and money.

card_5.heading: Competitor Monitoring
card_5.text: Get insight into your competitors' pricing strategies and use the data to enrich your feeds. Use this information to increase / decrease bidding on your ads.

card_6.heading: Background Removal
card_6.text:
Save time with automated background removal on your product images.
Reduce rejection in Google Merchant Center with product images that follow Google’s guidelines. A one-time fee.

card_7.heading: Crawl Websites
card_7.text:
Looking to create a product feed from scratch.
Our crawl tool makes it easy to collect product data from any shopping platform or website.

card_8.heading: Scrape From Websites
card_8.text:
Scrape specific data from your website and merge it to your product feed.
Do you have incomplete product information? No worries! Retrieve the missing attributes by extracting the data from your website and integrating it into your main feed.

card_9.heading: Access to feed experts
card_9.text: Get personalized support from our knowledgeable CSMs and take your business to new apexes with our monthly consultancy hours at half the cost. Sign up now and let us help you achieve your goals!

children.name: left_column_width
children.label: Left column width
children.help_text: Make sure the sum of "Left column width" and "Right column width" are equal to or less than 12 if you want them to be next to eachother on desktop sizes.
children.inline_help_text: The number represents (n/12). E.g. 8 fills out 8 of 12 columns (66.666%)

children.name: right_column_width
children.label: Right column width
children.help_text: Make sure the sum of "Left column width" and "Right column width" are equal to or less than 12 if you want them to be next to eachother on desktop sizes.
children.inline_help_text: The number represents (n/12). E.g. 8 fills out 8 of 12 columns (66.666%)

children.name: choose_your_plan_form_padding
children.label: Choose your plan form padding
children.help_text: This adds whitespace around the slider form section

children.name: slider_range_color
children.label: Slider range color
children.help_text: The color of the range slider (not the circle you drag)

children.name: lines_color
children.label: Plan lines color
children.help_text: The lines in and around the slider form - the border and the lines between the plan info such as the lines between "Products/SKUs" and "Projects".

children.name: lines_thickness
children.label: Plan lines thickness
children.help_text: The lines in and around the slider form - the border and the lines between the plan info such as the lines between "Products/SKUs" and "Projects".

children.name: lines_color
children.label: Add-on border color
children.help_text: Sets the color of the border of every add-on card.

children.name: bg_color
children.label: Add-on background color
children.help_text: Sets the background color of every add-on card.

children.name: text_color
children.label: Add-on text color
children.help_text: Sets the text color of every add-on card.
children.inline_help_text: Leave this blank to use the set theme colors unless necessary

children.name: border_radius
children.label: Add-on border radius
children.help_text: Sets the add-on card border-radius.

children.name: btn_padding_tb
children.label: Add-on button padding (top/bottom)
children.help_text: Sets the space between the text and the top/bottom edges of the button
children.inline_help_text: Leave blank to use the padding set on the button style above

children.name: btn_padding_lr
children.label: Add-on button padding (left/right)
children.help_text: Sets the space between the text and the left/right edges of the button
children.inline_help_text: Leave blank if you want the button to be full width

children.name: center_btn
children.label: Center button
children.help_text: Centers the add-on card button, will not do anything if left/right button padding is left blank

children.name: make_right_column_sticky
children.label: Make right column sticky?
children.help_text: Sticky elements follow the screen on scroll (within their containers)

children.name: bg_color
children.label: Background Color:
children.help_text: Set the background color of the row here.

children.name: shadow
children.label: Do you want a subtle shadow?

children.name: section_id
children.label: CSS ID:
children.help_text: This sets an ID on the row in case you'd like to use an anchor tag and have the page scroll to this section.

children.name: section_class
children.label: CSS Class:
children.help_text: This is helpful if you know just a enough of CSS to be dangerous.  Make sure that class names don't have spaces.
